GlossaryCacheEntry.Definition: a jacket that is elastic and highly breathable, made of windproof and water-repellent material
men's underpants with softshell front panel that keeps you warm in cold and windy conditions.
the physical and/or mental strength to do something that might be difficult and will take a long time
a route that has been laid out, constructed and maintained specifically for cross-country skiing
pants made to work well in skiing, and they often do double duty as running pants. The front is windproof, and most models have air permeable, super breathable back panels

trails that are meticulously maintained and prepared by machinery like snow groomers, snowcats, or trail grooming equipment. These machines compact and smooth the surface, creating well-defined tracks or paths
